text: Kassowal railway station (Urdu and )is located in Kassowal town, Sahiwal district of Punjab province of the Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Sahiwal District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Kassowal railway station
